stimulusHtml: Which of the following statements about the series  ∑ n=1 ∞ 1 2 n −n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@41C6@ is true?
choicesHtml: The series diverges by the nth term test.

The series diverges by limit comparison to the harmonic series  ∑ n=1 ∞ 1 n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3ED4@ .
The series converges by the nth term test

The series converges by limit comparison to the geometric series  ∑ n=1 ∞ 1 2 n MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FD1@ .
